get.description: List all listings

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Order status to filter by

parameters.description: Sell item contract address to filter by

parameters.description: Buy item type to filter by

parameters.description: Buy item contract address to filter by

parameters.description: The account address of the user who created the listing

parameters.description: The metadata_id of the sell item

parameters.name: sell_item_token_id
parameters.description: Sell item token identifier to filter by

parameters.name: from_updated_at
parameters.description: From updated at including given date

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return per page

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Order field to sort by. `buy_item_amount` sorts by per token price, for example if 5 ERC-1155s are on sale for 10eth, its sorted as 2eth for `buy_item_amount`.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Ascending or descending direction for sort

schema.description: Ascending or descending direction for sort

parameters.description: Page cursor to retrieve previous or next page. Use the value returned in the response.

get.description: Search NFT stacks

parameters.name: chain_name
parameters.description: The name of chain

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: List of contract addresses to filter by

parameters.name: account_address
parameters.description: Account address to filter by

parameters.name: only_include_owner_listings
parameters.description: Whether to the listings should include only the owner created listings

parameters.name: only_if_has_active_listings
parameters.description: Filters results to include only stacks that have a current active listing. False and 'null' return all unfiltered stacks.

parameters.name: traits
parameters.description: JSON encoded traits to filter by. e.g. encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify({"rarity": {"values": ["common", "rare"], "condition": "eq"}}))

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search NFT name and description. Alphanumeric characters only.

parameters.name: payment_token
parameters.description: Filters the active listings, bids, floor listing and top bid by the specified payment token, either the address of the payment token contract or 'NATIVE'

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort results in a specific order

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page

parameters.name: page_cursor
parameters.description: Encoded page cursor to retrieve previous or next page. Use the value returned in the response.

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found (404)

MetadataRefreshLimit.description: The refresh request limit available to the project for each one-hour window.

MetadataRefreshLimitReset.description: The expiry date of the current one-hour window.

MetadataRefreshLimitRemaining.description: The number of refresh requests remaining in the current window.

MetadataRefreshRetryAfter.description: The number of seconds until the next refresh request can be made.

RetryAfter.description: The number of seconds until the next request can be made.

MintRequestsLimit.description: The mint requests limit available to the project for each time window.

MintRequestsLimitReset.description: The expiry date of the current time window.

MintRequestsLimitRemaining.description: The number of mint requests remaining in the current window.

MintRequestsRetryAfter.description: The number of seconds until the next refresh request can be made.

next_cursor.description: Last item as an encoded string

fees.description: Buy fees should only include maker marketplace fees and should be no more than two entries as more entires will incur more gas. It is best practice to have this as few as possible.

end_at.description: Time after which the Order is considered expired

salt.description: A random value added to the create Order request

sell.description: Sell item for listing should be an ERC721 item

start_at.description: Time after which Order is considered active

start_at.description: Time after which Order is considered active

amount.description: Fee payable to recipient upon settlement

salt.description: A random value added to the create Order request

signature.description: Digital signature generated by the user for the specific Order

start_at.description: Time after which Order is considered active

updated_at.description: Time the Order is last updated

buy.description: Buy items are transferred from the taker to the maker.

buyer_address.description: Deprecated. Use maker and taker addresses instead of buyer and seller addresses.

buyer_fees.description: Deprecated. Use fees instead. The taker always pays the fees.

indexed_at.description: Time the on-chain trade event is indexed by the order book system

sell.description: Sell items are transferred from the maker to the taker.

seller_address.description: Deprecated. Use maker and taker addresses instead of buyer and seller addresses.

pending_cancellations.description: Orders which are marked for cancellation but the cancellation cannot be guaranteed

failed_cancellations.description: Orders which failed to be cancelled

order.description: ID of the order which failed to be cancelled

reason_code.description: Reason code indicating why the order failed to be cancelled

name.description: The order status indicating a order is has been cancelled or about to be cancelled.

pending.description: Whether the cancellation of the order is pending

cancellation_type.description: Whether the cancellation was done on-chain or off-chain or as a result of an underfunded account

name.description: The order status that indicates the order is yet to be active due to various reasons.

evaluated.description: Whether the order has been evaluated after its creation

started.description: Whether the order has reached its specified start time

name.description: The order status that indicates an order can be fulfilled.
The order status that indicates an order cannot be fulfilled.

sufficient_approvals.description: Whether the order offerer has sufficient approvals

sufficient_balances.description: Whether the order offerer still has sufficient balance to complete the order

name.description: A terminal order status indicating that an order cannot be fulfilled due to expiry.
A terminal order status indicating that an order has been fulfilled.

order_type.description: Seaport order type. Orders containing ERC721 tokens will need to pass in the order type as FULL_RESTRICTED while orders with ERC1155 tokens will need to pass in the order_type as PARTIAL_RESTRICTED

counter.description: big.Int or uint256 string for order counter

TradeBlockchainMetadata.description: The metadata related to the transaction in which the activity occurred

transaction_hash.description: The transaction hash of the trade

transaction_index.description: Transaction index in a block (uint32 as string)

log_index.description: The log index of the fulfillment event in a block (uint32 as string)

FillStatus.description: The ratio of the order that has been filled, an order that has been fully filled will have the same numerator and denominator values.

numerator.description: The numerator of the fill status

denominator.description: The denominator of the fill status

details.description: Additional details to help resolve the error

linked_addresses.description: The user's list of linked addresses

clientName.description: Name of client that linked the wallet

type.description: This should be the EIP-6963 rdns value, if you're unable to get the rdns value you can provide "External". If using WalletConnect then provide "WalletConnect".

wallet_address.description: The address of the external wallet being linked to Passport

nonce.description: A unique identifier for the signature

passport_address.description: The user's Passport address if it has been registered

linked_addresses.description: The user's list of linked addresses

gems_earnable.description: Amount of gems earnable when user completes the quest

bypass.description: If the quest is bypassed, the user will not be able to see it on the feed

day_zero.description: If the quest is a day0 quest

quest_completed_popup_text.description: Text to display when the quest is completed in an onboarding experience

tags.description: The tags for the feed item

control_tags.description: Some specific tags for controlling feed items

categories.description: The categories for the feed item

onboarding_experience.description: The onboarding experience for the feed item

header_video_url.description: URL of the quiz header video

correct_answer_text.description: The text to display when the user answers the quiz correctly

header_initial_image.description: The initial image for the quiz header

header_answered_image.description: The image to display when the user answers the quiz correctly

label.description: The label for the CTA button

description.description: The description for the CTA button

url.description: The URL for the CTA button

image.description: The image for the CTA background

redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to when the user completes the sign in quest

background.description: The background for the sign in quest

description.description: The description for the CTA button

url.description: The URL for the CTA button

platform_name.description: The name of the platform social quest belongs to

id.description: The unique identifier of the session activity contract

name.description: The name of the session activity contract

client_id.description: The client ID associated with the session activity contract

chain_id.description: The chain ID for the session activity contract

enabled.description: Whether the session activity contract is enabled

created_at.description: The timestamp when the session activity contract was created

nft_count.description: Number of NFTs that have this trait. Uint256 as string

values.description: List of 100 most common values for this trait sorted by number of associated NFTs

omitted_values_count.description: Indicated how many more distinct values exist

contract_address.description: ETH Address of collection that the asset belongs to

filters.description: List of all filters and the most common values

token_id.description: Token id of NFT (uint256 as string)

updated_at.description: When the metadata was last updated

image.description: The image url of the NFT

external_url.description: The external website link of NFT

animation_url.description: The animation url of the NFT

type.description: Token type user is offering, which in this case is the native IMX token
Token type user is offering, which in this case is ERC20

PaymentAmount.description: The token amount value. This value is provided in the smallest unit of the token (e.g. wei for ETH)

ConvertedPrices.description: A mapping of converted prices for major currencies such as ETH, USD. All converted prices are fee-inclusive.

amount.description: Amount of token included in the listing

token_id.description: Token ID. Null for collection bids that can be fulfilled by any asset in the collection
